page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: At 7.30 a.m. I woke up and went downstairs for my breakfast of cereals and toast.After having a wash and cleaning my teeth I got dressed and set off for school.At school when we'd been through the register I did paired reading with one of the first year girls who has difficulty with her reading.Later we had spelling and tables tests until playtime when we played a game called elastic.In this game we jump over elastic at different heights.After play I wrote a poem and drew a picture of a fox. I also did some maths.After dinner Simon finished off his talk-about and we went into the hall to listen to a man talking about his travels.When we came in after play we had a quiz. When school had finished I dashed home and watched television until 10.30p.m.Then bed.
